response.original_title: L'Apollonide, souvenirs de la maison close
response.overview: The dawn of the 20th century: L’Apollonide, a luxurious and traditional brothel in Paris, is living its last days. In this closed world, where some men fall in love and others become viciously harmful, the women share their secrets, their fears, their joys and their pains.
response.title: House of Pleasures

titles.title: L'Apollonide: Os Amores da Casa de Tolerância
メゾン～ある娼館の記憶～
